name: vfnode
description: High-performance VRF Node for cryptographically secure coinflip service

scripts.setup: npm run setup:rust && npm run setup:db && npm run build
scripts.setup:db: npm run db:create && npm run db:migrate
scripts.restart: npm run stop && sleep 2 && npm run start:background
scripts.status: ps aux | grep vfnode | grep -v grep || echo 'VF Node not running'
scripts.test: npm run test:health && npm run test:performance
scripts.test:health: curl -s http://localhost:3001/health | jq || echo 'Server not responding'
scripts.dev: npm run setup && npm run start:background && echo 'VF Node ready at http://localhost:3001'

author: VF Node Team
